short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert units and currencies just by highlighting them.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Convert units just by highlighting and hovering them.

You can convert:
- Currency
- Weight
- Length
- Volume
- Temperature

Tips and tricks:
- Hide a conversion and hover area by middle clicking it.
- Click on and expand a conversion to see more units.
- Start typing after expanding to search through units.
- Highlight and convert more than one unit in one shot. Just hover over the one you want to see.
